price: Kuma yã kasance yanã umurnin mutãnens *da salla da zakka. Kuma yã kasance yardajje a wurin Ubangijinsa.
arabic: وَكَانَ يَأۡمُرُ أَهۡلَهُۥ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ وَكَانَ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ مَرۡضِيّٗا
footnotes: * Mãtarsa da 'ya'yansa da Jurhum, yanã umurninsu da salla da zakka. Yanã wajaba ga mutum ya umurci iyalinsa da tsare haƙƙõƙin Allah.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakāna yamuru ahlahu bil-ṣalati wal-zakati wakāna ʿinda rabbihi marḍiyyan
